ShipmentItem.name: ShipmentItem
ShipmentItem.description: Represents an order item included in a shipment.

ExpectedDeliveryDate.description: Expected delivery date of the shipment that contains the shipment item.

Product2Id.description: The product represented by the shipment item.

Quantity.description: The quantity of products represented by the shipment item.

ReturnOrderLineItemId.description: For a return ShipmentItem, the associated ReturnOrderLineItem.

ShipmentId.description: (Master-Detail) The shipment that contains the shipment item.

ShipmentItemNumber.description: An auto-generated number identifying the shipment item.

TrackingNumber.description: The tracking number of the shipment that contains the shipment item.

TrackingUrl.description: The tracking URL of the shipment that contains the shipment item.

FulfillmentOrderLineItemId.description: The FulfillmentOrderLineItem (fulfillment order product) corresponding to the shipment item.

OrderItemSummaryId.description: The OrderItemSummary (order product summary) corresponding to the shipment item.
